rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space with minimalistic design and a small reception desk.
Multi-functional open space for social gatherings, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to let natural light flood in. This area doubles as a dining room with modular seating options.
Efficient kitchen layout with storage and modern appliances. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall provide ample daylight.
Separate guest room for family visitors; includes built-in storage.
Space for laundry and other utilities, ensuring the villa remains clutter-free.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring a serene atmosphere and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning the bed with the door.
Additional sleeping area for joint family members, designed with privacy in mind.
Compact bathroom attached to the second bedroom, ensuring functionality and privacy.
